title: Quick Asian noodle salad
ingredients: ['225g Asian noodles or spaghetti', '1 bunch spring onions, sliced', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', '75g peanut butter, or to taste', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '4 tablespoons hot water', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon crushed chilli flakes']
